summary:
Mothman is a mysterious creature from West Virginia folklore. People reported seeing a tall, bird-like being with glowing red eyes in Point Pleasant from 1966 to 1967. The local newspaper first wrote about it, and the story quickly spread across the country. Some think these sightings were just rare birds like sandhill cranes.

The Mothman legend gained fame through books and a movie starring Richard Gere. Every year, a festival in Point Pleasant celebrates this eerie folklore.
title: Mothman
